discovery_rule.name: Zfs Dataset discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover ZFS fileset. Fileset names must contain a "/" else it's a zpool.

trigger_prototype.name: ZFS: Less than 20% free space on zpool {#FILESETNAME} on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App zfs:script.zfs.run.iregexp("error")}=1 or {Template App zfs:script.zfs.run.regexp("Permission denied")}=1
trigger.name: ZFS: script.zfs.run contain ERROR msg
ZFS: Version of ZoL is now {ITEM.VALUE} on {HOST.NAME}

graph.name: ZFS: ARC cache hits by cache list
